articles.title: ‘Everybody Loves Raymond’ Reunion: Five Big Moments and Memories - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The cast of the beloved sitcom and creator Phil Rosenthal celebrated (almost) 30 years since its premiere on CBS.

articles.title: Judge Plans to Force Sale of Nicki Minaj's $20 Million Mansion to Pay Security Guard's Judgment - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Nicki Minaj's $20 million California mansion will likely be put up for sale if the rapper doesn't pay a security guard by Jan. 22, a judge has warned.

articles.title: ‘The Queen Of Versailles’ Gets Quick Broadway Closing Date - Deadline
articles.description: The Broadway musical The Queen of Versailles, which opened November 9, 2025, will play its final performance on January 4, 2026.

articles.title: Tara Reid hospitalized after her drink was 'tampered with' at hotel - USA Today
articles.description: Tara Reid, who was staying at a hotel in Rosemont, Illinois, is recovering after the actress claimed her drink was drugged in a "traumatic" incident.

articles.description: 'Wicked: For Good' Promotional Partners stand at $330M in media value, second best for any studio movie behind 'Wicked's $350M. Monday box office is best non-holiday for 2025 at $14M+.
